mapper.select: SELECT sa.id, sa.content AS answerContent, sa.status, sa.teacher_feedback AS teacherFeedback, sa.score, p.problem AS problemContent, t.topic_name AS topicName, c.course_name AS courseName FROM student_answer sa LEFT JOIN problem p ON sa.problem_id = p.id LEFT JOIN topics t ON p.topic_id = t.topic_id LEFT JOIN courses c ON t.courses_id = c.course_id WHERE sa.id = #{id}
